sections.title: Satellite

Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks

sections.title: Portege
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Portege z835-P330 | 2016-03-30 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | – | Hibernate: Untested | Make sure to enable i915_enable_rc6 and i915_enable_fbc for maximum battery lifeNo fan control, noisy fan fixed with 1.6 bios update
Portege z930-S9311 | 2016-02-11 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Untested | Hibernate: Untested |  | 
Portege Z10T-A | 2013-06-11 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | – | Hibernate: Untested | No: Touchpad | The touchpad don't work, the lock rotation button is a super button.
Portege Z20t-B2112 | 2019-01-16 | Yes | Partial* | Yes | Yes | Yes | Hibernate: Untested | *No sound from speaker after suspendDual monitor setup needs one cable to the screen and the other one to the base (keyboard), both cables to the base does not work.
Portege Z30-A | 2015-10-10 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes* | Yes* | Untested |  | *See dedicated page
Portege X40-G | 2022-12-29 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Poor | For roughly 80% of reboots, inbuilt keyboard and mouse input are buffered by ~2 seconds, with same issue on Ubuntu. Difficult to use without external keyboard and mouse.
Portege m700 | 2023-01-26 | Yes | Yes | Untested | Yes | Untested | Hibernate: Untested | Untested: Touchscreen | Volume can not be controlled by the wheel.
